subject: Thank you for interviewing with Microsoft
body_text:
Dear Candidate,

Thank you for interviewing for the Software Engineer Intern position at Microsoft. We appreciate the time you invested in our interview process.

After careful consideration, we have decided not to move forward with your application at this time. This decision was not easy, as we had many qualified candidates.

We encourage you to apply to future positions at Microsoft. Your application will remain in our system for one year.

We wish you success in your career.

Best regards,
Microsoft University Recruiting Team

Dear Candidate,

Thank you for interviewing at Microsoft. We have decided not to move forward with your application at this time.
